description: Another addition to the water-resistant ‘Ohana collection is ‘Ohana Pa‘i. This reliable beach sandal takes the smooth, contoured design you know and love and kicks it up a notch with original Wai Camo artwork. Inspired by the movement of the rivers and streams that helped establish ancient ahupua‘a (subdivisions of land within a Hawaiian island), this sandal is a testament to the importance of wai (freshwater).
name: Olukai Ohana Pai - Mens
